He can also adopt a ready stance and expel projectiles all around him. They'll fly about like angry gnats and threaten to deal several hits, but these are the kind of projectiles you can easily deflect with your staff spin.
img_below_text: Aside from this, he doesn't have too much else to worry about. As long as you can get rid of his students quickly, and react quickly whenever he swings the bigger sword, you can anticipate and retaliate against most of his moves. When he falls, he'll drop a Knot of Voidness, and you can claim his Commander Beetle Spirit.
